p.b: The mission of the Boyceville Community School District
, as a partner with family and community,

is to provide a high quality education in which students gain respect for themselves, others, and their surrounding and develop a desire for excellence while learning the skills to become contributing members of a global society.

p.span: At-Home Learning: Art 1 & 2 worked with Alphabet Photography this week. They had to spell a 4 letter word by taking photos of objects around their homes.
Dear Boyceville Community School District Families, The Department of Health Services Secretary-designee Andrea Palm extended the current Safer at Home Order under Order #28. According to this...
Learning From Home: The Bauer kids are doing science at home. They have 40 eggs in their incubator! Twenty one days to baby chicks! Stay tuned for hatching pics. #BoycevilleBulldogs
Boyceville Community School District added 6 new photos.
Students and Families, As we progress through this new type of learning environment, we would like to share with you a guide to completing your work each week. We hope that this will help you...
